about_the_game:
“I am willing to give everything to become the protagonist in your story, even if I am the ANTAGONIST in the script.”

Abandoned Hansel and Gretel follow the sweet aroma to the candy house. Strangely, although the candy house appears full of wonderful things, it is permeated by an eerie atmosphere.

The two encounter a moody doll, playful and mischievous teddy bears, elusive gingerbread twins, and a witch shrouded in mystery... The sweets here not only satisfy hunger but are also key to unraveling the many mysteries.

Develop recipes, collect ingredients, create various magical sweets, and record them in the dessert book!

Some sweets can be used as weapons, increase intelligence, even change form, and can attract mysterious creatures.

Every step they take is fraught with danger, and every choice they make will alter the course of the story.

Can Hansel and Gretel uncover the dark conspiracies hidden beneath the sweet sugar coating?

By creating magical sweets to solve mysteries, their choices would shape their fate. Uncover the truth beneath the sugar, or fall into dark plots?
